TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DispatchRuntime extends System.Object

summary.span: 公開屬性，這些屬性可用於修改預設服務行為以及附加自訂物件，而這些物件可以修改將傳入訊息轉換成物件並分派至作業的方式。

span.span: Exposes properties that can be used to modify default service behavior as well as attach custom objects that can modify how incoming messages are transformed into objects and dispatched to operations.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 類別，即可修改服務或個別端點的預設行為，或插入會對下列其中一項或所有服務程序實作自訂修改的物件：Use the class either to modify the default behavior of a service or individual endpoint, or to insert objects that implement custom modifications to one or both of the following service processes: 1. 將傳入訊息轉換成物件，並且在針對服務物件叫用方法時釋放這些物件。The transformation of incoming messages into objects and releasing those objects as method invocations on a service object. 2. 將回應叫用服務作業時收到的物件轉換成傳出訊息。The transformation of objects received from the response to a service operation invocation into outbound messages. 在 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 中，通道和端點發送器是負責接受新通道、 服務元件接收訊息、 方法分派和叫用，以及回應處理。In Windows Communication Foundation (WCF), the channel and endpoint dispatchers are the service components responsible for accepting new channels, receiving messages, method dispatch and invocation, and response processing. 每個由 物件公開的端點都有一個端點發送器和相關聯的通道發送器；此外，每個參與雙工通訊的用戶端對於每個回呼端點也都有一個端點發送器和通道發送器。Each endpoint exposed by a object has one endpoint dispatcher and an associated channel dispatcher; in addition, each client that participates in duplex communication also has an endpoint dispatcher and channel dispatcher for each callback endpoint. 即使無法辨識訊息， 仍可讓您為特定合約上的所有訊息攔截及擴充通道或端點發送器。The enables you to intercept and extend the channel or endpoint dispatcher for all messages across a particular contract, even when a message is not recognized. 當不符合在合約中宣告之任何訊息的訊息到達時，該訊息會被分派至由 屬性傳回的作業。When a message arrives that does not match any messages declared in the contract it is dispatched to the operation that was returned by the property. 若要針對特定作業在所有訊息上進行攔截或擴充，請參閱 類別。To intercept or extend across all messages for a particular operation, see the class. 發送器擴充性的四個主要區域是由 類別所公開：There are four main areas of dispatcher extensibility exposed by the class: 1. 分派元件會使用 的屬性以及相關聯通道發送器的屬性 (由 屬性傳回)，自訂通道發送器接受及關閉通道的方式。Dispatch components use the properties of the and those of the associated channel dispatcher returned by the property to customize how the channel dispatcher accepts and closes channels. 這個分類包括 和 屬性。This category includes the and properties. 2. 訊息元件會針對所處理的各個訊息進行自訂。Message components are customized for each message processed. 這個分類包括 、、 和 屬性。This category includes the , , , and the properties. 3. 執行個體元件會自訂服務類型執行個體的建立、存留期和處置。Instance components customize the creation, lifetime, and disposal of instances of the service type. 如需服務物件存留期的詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性。For more information about service object lifetimes, see the property. 這個分類包括 和 屬性。This category includes the and the properties. 4. 安全性相關的元件可以使用下列屬性：Security-related components can use the following properties: - 會指出要將稽核事件寫入何處。 indicates where audit events are written. - 會控制服務是否會嘗試使用由傳入訊息提供的認證來進行模擬。 controls whether the service attempts to impersonate using the credentials provided by the incoming message. - 會控制是否要將成功的訊息驗證事件寫入由 指定的事件記錄檔。 controls whether successful message authentication events are written to the event log specified by . - 會控制 屬性的設定方式。 controls how the property is set. - 會指定稽核授權事件的執行方式。 specifies how the auditing of authorization events is performed. - 會指定是否要隱藏在記錄處理期間發生的非嚴重例外狀況。 specifies whether to suppress non-critical exceptions that occur during the logging process. 一般來說，自訂延伸物件會指派給 屬性，或由服務行為 (實作 的物件)、合約行為 (實作 的物件) 或端點行為 (實作 的物件) 插入到集合中。Typically custom extension objects are assigned to a property or inserted into a collection by a service behavior (an object that implements ), a contract behavior (an object that implements ), or an endpoint behavior (an object that implements ). 接著，安裝行為物件會透過程式設計的方式或實作自訂 物件的方式新增至適當的行為集合，讓該行為可以透過應用程式組態檔插入。Then the installing behavior object is added to the appropriate collection of behaviors either programmatically or by implementing a custom object to enable the behavior to be inserted using an application configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutomaticInputSessionShutdown { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutomaticInputSessionShutdown : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定當用戶端關閉輸出工作階段時，服務是否要關閉輸入工作階段。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the service closes an input session when the client closes an output session.

value.span: 如果服務在用戶端關閉輸出工作階段時關閉輸入工作階段，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the service closes an input session when the client closes an output session; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您將 屬性設定為 `false`，該通道就必須由另一種機制來關閉。If you set the property to `false`, the channel must be closed by some other mechanism. 在這種情況下，您必須將自訂工作階段關機處理常式新增至 屬性。In this case, you must add a custom session shutdown handler to the property. 根據預設，當用戶端關閉輸出工作階段，且服務已完成處理任何剩餘的訊息時，伺服器便會關閉工作階段。By default when a client closes an output session and the service has finished processing any remaining messages the server closes the session. 將 設定為 `false`，以防止伺服器自動關閉工作階段，並啟用工作階段存留期的自訂控制。Setting to `false` prevents the server from automatically closing the session and enables custom control of session lifetimes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CallbackClientRuntime As ClientRuntime

summary.span: 取得 物件，此物件代表 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 延伸模組對雙工回呼端點之傳出呼叫的安裝點。

span.span: Gets the object that represents the installation point for extensions to Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) for outbound calls to a duplex callback endpoint.

value.span: 物件，它是透過雙工合約進行之執行階段用戶端自訂的安裝點。

span.span: The object that is the installation point for run-time client customization in duplex contracts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 來新增自訂延伸物件，這些物件可檢視或修改將參數轉換成傳出訊息、以及將回應訊息轉回傳回值。Use the to add custom extension objects that view or modify the conversion of parameters to outbound messages and response messages back into return values. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。For details, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChannelDispatcher As ChannelDispatcher

summary.span: 取得這個分派執行階段物件的 。

span.span: Gets the for this dispatch run-time object.

value.span: 分派執行階段物件的通道發送器。

span.span: The channel dispatcher for the dispatch run-time object.

summary.span: 取得或設定服務的執行個體是循序處理或同時處理訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets whether an instance of a service processes messages sequentially or concurrently.

value.span: 物件，此物件會控制服務的執行個體是循序處理或同時處理訊息。

span.span: A object that controls whether an instance of a service processes messages sequentially or concurrently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服務實作必須是安全執行緒，才能使用 `Multiple` 並行模式。The service implementation must be thread-safe to use the `Multiple` concurrency mode.

The for this dispatch runtime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性來取得與這個分派執行階段有關聯的端點發送器，即可修改或自訂端點特定的執行。Use the property to obtain the endpoint dispatcher associated with this dispatch runtime to modify or customize endpoint-specific execution.

span.span: if messages are to be dispatched in the order they were sent; otherwise, .

summary.span: 取得或設定外部授權原則，這組原則會定義用於授權使用者、指定宣告集的一組規則。

span.span: Gets or sets the external authorization policies that define a set of rules for authorizing a user, given a set of claims.

value.span: 物件的 ，此集合會定義用於授權使用者、指定宣告集的一組規則。

span.span: A of objects that define a set of rules for authorizing a user, given a set of claims.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來新增 的自訂實作，即可定義用於授權使用者、指定宣告集的一組規則。Use this property to add a custom implementation of that defines a set of rules for authorizing a user, given a set of claims. 這個自訂實作會在每次呼叫服務時使用。This custom implementation is used every time the service is called.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IgnoreTransactionMessageProperty { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IgnoreTransactionMessageProperty : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定指定是否要忽略 的值。

span.span: Gets or sets whether to ignore the .

value.span: 如果在執行服務方法時忽略 ，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: , the is ignored when executing the service method; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓協力廠商通道開發人員使用專屬的異動流程機制，針對其通道來導入他們的交易到 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF)。The allows third-party channel developers who use a proprietary transaction flow mechanism for their channel to introduce their transaction into Windows Communication Foundation (WCF). 如果這個屬性設定為 `true`，即表示在執行此服務方法時將忽略該交易。If this property is set to `true`, the transaction is ignored when executing the service method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會控制服務是否會使用傳入訊息提供的認證來嘗試模擬。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that controls whether the service attempts to impersonate using the credentials provided by the incoming message.

value.span: 如果服務會在作業的 屬性值為 或 時嘗試根據訊息認證進行模擬，則為 ，如果服務只有在作業的 屬性值為 時才嘗試模擬，則為 。

span.span: if the service attempts to impersonate based on message credentials when an operation's property value is either or ; if the service attempts impersonation only if an operation's property value is .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，即可控制是否在作業的 屬性值為 時執行模擬。Use the property to control whether impersonation is performed when an operation's property value is . 如果屬性為 `true` 但作業的 屬性值為 ，便會擲回例外狀況。An exception is thrown if the property is `true` but an operation's property value is . 如果作業的 屬性值為 ，便一定會嘗試模擬。If an operation's property value is impersonation is always attempted.

value.span: 如果在序列化回覆作業時使用模擬功能，則為 ，否則為。

span.span: if impersonation is used on serializing reply operation; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InputSessionShutdownHandlers As SynchronizedCollection(Of IInputSessionShutdown)

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得 物件的集合，該集合可用於新增自訂處理常式來控制輸入工作階段的關閉方式。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that can be used to add a custom handler to control how input sessions are closed.
A of type objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將 物件新增至這個屬性，即可控制輸入工作階段的關閉方式。Add an object to this property to control the manner in which input sessions are closed. 如果在 上呼叫 方法時是先傳回 `null` (表示該輸入工作階段已關閉)，發送器就會叫用各個 物件，並將 物件傳給它。When a call to the method on the first returns `null`, (which indicates that the input session has been closed), the dispatcher invokes each object, passing it an object. 自訂 物件可以使用這個 物件來執行清理各個通道狀態，或在關閉通道之前傳送回應訊息。Custom objects can use this object to perform clean-up for each channel state or to send a response message before closing the channel.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InstanceContextInitializers As SynchronizedCollection(Of IInstanceContextInitializer)

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得 物件的集合，此集合可在初次建立 物件時用於檢查或修改該物件。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that can be used to inspect or modify an object when it is first created.
A object of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性來新增自訂初始設定式，此初始設定式可在初次建立 物件時用來檢查或修改該物件。Use the property to add a custom initializer that can inspect or modify an object when it is first created. 物件的建立頻率是由 屬性所控制。The frequency with which objects are created is controlled by the property.

The to be used by the .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Dispatcher::IInstanceProvider ^ InstanceProvider { System::ServiceModel::Dispatcher::IInstanceProvider ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Dispatcher::IInstanceProvider ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件，您可以使用該物件來控制服務物件的建立和解構。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that you can use to control the creation and destruction of service objects.

value.span: 物件，此物件會控制與 物件關聯之服務物件的建立和解構。

span.span: An object that controls the creation and destruction of service objects associated with an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作 介面並將此實作指派給 屬性，即可控制使用非預設建構函式之建構函式的服務型別執行個體，例如，實作像是執行個體共用的自訂執行個體模式。Implement the interface and assign the implementation to the property to control instances of the service type using a constructor other than the default constructor, for example, to implement a custom instancing mode such as instance pooling. 一般來說，當初次建立 物件時，便會叫用一次 方法。Typically the method is invoked once, when the object is first created. 當關閉 物件時，也會叫用一次 方法。The method is also invoked once, when the object is closed. 服務也可以設定成在關閉 物件之前釋出執行個體。A service can also be configured to release an instance before the object is closed. 這項設定可以使用 屬性或呼叫 方法來完成。This can be configured by using the property or by calling the method. 完成這項設定之後， 物件便會呼叫 方法。If this is done, the object calls the method. 如果在執行個體釋放之後有新訊息到達，這時會使用 方法建立新的執行個體。If a new message arrives after the instance has been released, a new instance is created using the method.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether successful message authentication events are written to the event log specified by .
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，即可指定是否要將成功的訊息驗證事件寫入事件記錄檔。Use the property to specify whether successful message authentication events are written to the event log.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MessageInspectors As SynchronizedCollection(Of IDispatchMessageInspector)

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得 物件的集合，此集合可用來為整個端點上的所有傳入和傳出訊息附加自訂訊息偵測器。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that can be used to attach a custom message inspector for all incoming and outgoing messages across the endpoint.
A object of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性來附加自訂 物件，即可檢查或轉換所有經過端點的訊息。Use the property to attach custom objects that can inspect or transform all messages that flow through the endpoint. 由於 物件會取得訊息的參考，因此您可以緩衝處理它並檢查本文的複本。Because the object gets a reference to the message, you can buffer it and examine a copy of the body.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Operations As SynchronizedKeyedCollection(Of String, DispatchOperation)

summary.span: 取得 物件的集合，此集合可用於控制特定作業的執行行為。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that can be used to control the execution behavior of a particular operation.

value.span: 型別 和 物件的 。

span.span: A of type and objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，即可檢查或修改參數、控制參數和傳回值序列化和還原序列化、控制作業叫用，以及修改單一作業的其他行為。Use the property to inspect or modify parameters, control parameter and return value serialization and deserialization, control operation invocation, and modify other behaviors for a single operation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。For details, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Dispatcher::IDispatchOperationSelector ^ OperationSelector { System::ServiceModel::Dispatcher::IDispatchOperationSelector ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Dispatcher::IDispatchOperationSelector ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件，此物件會控制選取特定訊息的目的地 。

span.span: Gets or sets the object that controls the selection of a destination for a particular message.
The object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，即可決定哪個作業要接收指定的訊息。Use the property to decide which operation receives a given message. 預設的作業選取器會傳回訊息的動作標頭值，該值會用來做為找出正確 的索引鍵。The default operation selector returns the value of the action header for the message, which is used as the key to locate the correct . 如果找不到相符的作業，該叫用就會分派給 屬性的傳回值。If no matching operation is found, the invocation is dispatched to the return value from the property.

value.span: 如果已保留訊息，則為 ，否則為 。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Description::PrincipalPermissionMode PrincipalPermissionMode { System::ServiceModel::Description::PrincipalPermissionMode get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Description::PrincipalPermissionMode value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定 屬性的設定方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the property is set.

value.span: 其中一個 值，預設值為 。

span.span: One of the values; the default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當 為 時， 屬性便不會設定。When the is , the property is not set. 當值為 時， 屬性會根據傳入訊息的使用者認證填入 。When the value is the property is populated with a based on the user credentials of the incoming message. 當值為 時， 屬性會根據 角色資訊填入 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 物件。When the value is the property is populated with an object based on [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] role information. 當值為 時， 屬性會由自訂 實作填入。When the value is the property is populated by a custom implementation.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會控制對何種服務授權事件進行稽核。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that controls what service authorization events are audited.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在預設的情況中，不會稽核任何服務授權事件。In the default case, no service authorization events are audited. 如果 值為 ，只有成功的服務授權事件會寫入由 屬性指定的稽核記錄檔。If the value is , only successful service authorization events are written to the audit log specified by the property. 如果這個屬性有 的值，只有不成功的服務授權事件會寫入由 屬性指定的稽核記錄檔。If this property has a value of , only unsuccessful service authorization events are written to the audit log specified by the property. 如果 值為 ，成功和失敗的服務授權事件都會寫入稽核記錄檔。If the value is , both successful and failed service authorization events are written to the audit log.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定是否隱藏在記錄程序期間發生的非嚴重例外狀況。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to suppress non-critical exceptions that occur during the logging process.

value.span: 如果隱藏在記錄處理期間發生的非嚴重例外狀況，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if non-critical exceptions that occur during the logging process are suppressed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果希望將在寫入稽核記錄檔期間發生的例外狀況重新擲回至應用程式，請將 設定為 `false`。Set to `false` if you want exceptions that occur during the course of writing the audit log to be re-thrown to the application. 在預設的情況中，只有因嘗試寫入稽核事件所造成的 、、 和 例外狀況會被重新擲回至應用程式，所有的其他例外狀況都會被隱藏。In the default case, only the , , , and exceptions that result from attempts to write audit events are re-thrown to the application; all other exceptions are suppressed.

summary.span: 取得或設定用於叫用服務作業的同步化內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the synchronization context that is used to invoke the service operations.

value.span: 用於判斷服務作業是叫用哪一個執行緒的 物件。

span.span: The object used to determine on which thread the service operation is invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值可以是 `null`。The return value can be `null`. 如果這個值不是 `null`，這個同步化內容就會用於叫用正確執行緒上的服務作業。If this value is not `null`, then this synchronization context is used to invoke the service operations on the correct thread.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定是否要在工作階段關閉時自動完成目前的交易。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to automatically complete the current transaction when the session closes.

value.span: 如果交易會在工作階段關閉時自動完成，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if transactions automatically complete when the session closes; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為由 指定的值。

span.span: The default is the value specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 為 `true`，而此時為作用中的交易，該交易就會在工作階段關閉時完成。If is `true` and there is an active transaction, the transaction is completed when the session closes. 如果 為 `false`，作用中的交易不會完成，而且最終會中止。If is `false`, active transactions are not completed and are eventually aborted.
